law.text: Any person who violates any of the provisions of KRS 360.060 shall be fined not less than ten dollars ($10) nor more than fifty dollars ($50) for each offense.
law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 216, sec. 3. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2223-6.
